Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic, the main character Human Meteor, and sets up the initial underwater mystery and Duke's taxi driver persona before transitioning into a crime investigation plot.

sub_scenes.title: Page 1 Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic title, main character Human Meteor, and the initial underwater setting.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi and the G-Men Chase
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd is introduced in his taxi driver identity, picking up suspicious passengers and then reacting to a speeding 'G-Man's car', transforming into Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke's Taxi Ride to the Waterfront

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the occupants of the sedan, leading to a fight, followed by a positive reception from police and recovery in the hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Stowaway Plan and Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans with Toby to infiltrate a yacht, leading to Toby successfully stowing away but getting discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Danger and Duke's Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Playboys are seen working on the yacht, one is attacked. Duke suspects a setup, and Toby's true role is revealed as part of a submarine plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Yacht Deck Work and Cabin Trap
Submarine Plot and Toby's True Role

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Torpedo Plot
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor investigates underwater, discovering a sunken submarine and realizing a plot involving torpedoes and Japanese submarines.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts divers, leading to hostility, submarine escape attempt, and Human Meteor preparing to attack the ship.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers' Initial Encounter with Human Meteor
Human Meteor's Intervention and Divers' Hostility
Human Meteor's Threat and Divers' Retaliation
Discovery of Peter's Condition on Ship
Namor's Determined Final Attack and Ship Crew's Fear

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Duke chases to the yacht, finds Peter alive, searches for depth map, exposes Peter's treachery and visits Holden in hospital before reflecting on the day.

narrative_arcs.title: Search for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Exposing Peter's Treachery to the Officer
Evening Reflection after a Chaotic Day
Toby's Home and Invitation to Visit Holden

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and Bus Garage Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline involving the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis, transitioning into a mystery involving an ambulance, a bus garage, and a Nazi spy ring.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Action and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads fighting Nazis, followed by a shift to a suburban setting with an ambulance arriving at a house.

narrative_arcs.title: Liberty Lads in Action Against Nazis

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Clues and Marine Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Boys discover a bus garage address from a dropped wallet, investigate, and witness a Marine saluting a civilian, Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Bus Garage Address
Marine Salutes a Civilian - Major Bronson

sub_scenes.title: Abduction at Bus Garage
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at bus garage, are confronted by police, led to Mr. Horst, and abducted.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rescue at Bus Garage
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated by Mr. Horst, a fight breaks out, Major Bronson is shot, and boys are ordered to escape amidst chaos.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Sabotage Plans, and Marine Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Boys escape, seek help, discover sabotage plans, and Marines respond to rescue Major Bronson and confront attackers.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Sabotage Plans in Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Victory over Nazi Spies and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, fight and secure the area, Major Bronson is rescued, and they celebrate victory over Nazi spies.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Victory Over Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Henry in South America vs. Nazi Spies
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces 'The Champ' and Henry fighting Nazi spies in South America, focusing on the kidnapping of Rosita and their rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry and Setting in South America
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry battling Nazi spies, setting the scene in South America with soldiers searching for Americans.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and the Nazi Threat
Setting the Scene in South America and the Soldiers' Search
Confrontation and Fight in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Escape Decision
sub_scenes.description: Soldiers apprehend and interrogate civilians, Champ and Henry escape and decide to seek help from the American Consul.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape and the Decision to Seek the American Consul
Explanation of Suspicion: Rosita's Kidnapping and El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Kidnapping and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre forces men into a car, drives them to a house, where a woman mistakenly believes they brought her kidnapped daughter Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Entry into Car and Commanded Drive
Suspicious Car Ride and Destination Order

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Groups plan to confront El Tigre, infiltrate his hideout using stage dollars as a distraction.

narrative_arcs.title: Preparation for Action on Tamale Street
Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout with Stage Dollars

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Rescue of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation with El Tigre's men, search for Rosita, leading to her rescue and revelation of El Tigre's misrepresentation by Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre
Ride to Headquarters and Rescue Resolve
Citadel Escape and Rear Entrance Strategy
Machine Gun Deployment and Rosita's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Jungle Combat and Disobedience
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his combat actions, disobedience, and the consequences he faces.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat and then reports to a superior officer, revealing a discussion with Captain Lawton.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat with Devil Dog Dolan

sub_scenes.title: Confession and Justification of Disobedience
sub_scenes.description: Dolan or a superior justifies disobeying orders to save his son, held by foreign agents for sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Search and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan and companion arrive in jungle, Dolan explores alone, feels uneasy, and is ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Coercion for Plans and Dolan's Arson Escape
sub_scenes.description: Soldier rescued, orders given to obtain sub detector plans by force, Dolan is coerced into handing over plans and sets fire to escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Note Writing and Plan Negotiation under Duress
Devil Dog's Recovery and Plan Acquisition

sub_scenes.title: Marine Attack, Dolan's Capture, and Racist Justification
sub_scenes.description: Marines attack, Sam helps Dolan escape fire, Dolan justifies arson with racist views, and is captured while Sam is injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Native Huts Ablaze Amidst Marine Assault

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Fight and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan fights natives, Chief dies accidentally, natives show homage, leading to an alliance between Grauer and the tribe.

narrative_arcs.title: Dolan's Jungle Entrance and Initial Encounter
Fight with Natives and Chief's Demise
Grauer's Dialogue with Native and Alliance

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Captain faces dilemma due to Grauer's demands, officers fight attackers, shore leave rescinded for Dolan, and Captain disciplines Dolan.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Rescinded and Dolan's Discipline

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Burgess Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover a conspiracy involving racketeers and a sick daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins Story
sub_scenes.description: Narrator introduces the Twinkle Twins and their role in dealing with ruthless killers.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Briefing and Police Inquiry
sub_scenes.description: Twins are briefed on Burgess murder, evidence points to Tom Reilly, they go to police HQ and learn Reilly is in hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Newspaper Office Briefing on Burgess Murder
Police Station Inquiry about Reilly's Skip

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Reilly's Condition Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Twins go to hospital, learn about Reilly's illness from nurse and doctor, and see her in hospital bed.

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion Need and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: Twins discuss Reilly, doctor reveals only Farnacci's blood can save her, leading twins to suspect Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call to Elijah about Farnacci
Decision to Locate Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Twins search for Reilly in Irish section, meet Mrs. Murphy who reveals Reilly took blame for blood transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation about Reilly and Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Danger for Reilly and His Escape
sub_scenes.description: Farnacci's mob plans to kill Reilly, Reilly arrives at Mrs. Murphy's, and escapes from taxi.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Coal Chute Escape and Diane's Pursuit

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Gangsters arrested, ambulance arrives for shooting victim, Reilly recovers after transfusion, Farnacci imprisoned, birthday party for Reilly's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Transport and Concern for Victims
Failed Blood Donation Match and Community Appeal
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Response
Decision to Arrest Farnacci and Police Action
Police Raid on Poolroom and Arrest
